AI_Prompt_Template: Generate a local news report about {Winner} stopping {Enemy_Type} in {Location}. Include {Property_Damage} and {Civilian_Impact}. Keep it realistic and focus on community impact.
Example_Opening: Local hero saves the day as...

AI_Prompt_Template: Generate a police beat report about {Combat_Type} involving {Characters} in {Location}. Include arrest details and charges filed.
Generate a major news report about an epic battle between {Character_1} and {Character_2} in {Location}. Include {Property_Damage} and public safety concerns.
Generate an investigative journalism piece about how {Combat_Result} led to breakthrough in {Investigation_Topic}. Include sources and implications.
Generate a military press briefing about {Operation_Name} involving LSW assets. Include strategic objectives and operational success.
Generate a diplomatic news analysis of {Incident_Type} between {Faction_1} and {Faction_2}. Include international law implications.
Generate a scientific analysis of {Phenomenon} observed during {Event}. Include theoretical implications and future research directions.
Generate a medical report on casualties from {Combat_Event}. Include injury types and treatment requirements.
Generate a legal analysis of {Legal_Issues} arising from {Combat_Event}. Include potential charges and constitutional questions.
Generate a financial news report on economic impact of {Combat_Event}. Include insurance claims and market effects.
Generate a civilian eyewitness account of {Combat_Event}. Include personal perspective and emotional impact.
Example_Opening: I was there when it happened...

AI_Prompt_Template: Generate an inspirational account of {Heroic_Action} during {Combat_Event}. Focus on courage and self-sacrifice.
Generate a criminal profile analysis of {Villain_Name} after {Combat_Event}. Include psychological assessment and threat evaluation.
Generate a technology analysis of {Technology_Used} during {Combat_Event}. Include technical specifications and implications.
Generate an environmental impact assessment of {Environmental_Damage} from {Combat_Event}. Include ecological concerns.
Generate a political commentary on {Political_Implications} of {Combat_Event} from {Political_Perspective}.
Generate a conspiracy theory about the 'real' causes of {Combat_Event}. Include alternative explanations and hidden agendas.
Example_Opening: What they don't want you to know...

AI_Prompt_Template: Generate a corporate public relations statement about {Company_Impact} from {Combat_Event}. Include damage control and liability.
Generate a memorial service report for {Fallen_Character} who died in {Combat_Event}. Include tributes and legacy.
Generate a victory celebration report after {Major_Victory} in {Combat_Event}. Include public response and future hope.

Narrative_Style: Name and basic identification of combat victor
AI_Prompt_Template: Character name + power description + faction affiliation
Media_Source: Captain Thunder of the USA faction

Narrative_Style: Name and basic identification of combat loser
AI_Prompt_Template: Character name + power description + criminal/enemy status
Media_Source: Shadow Strike of the criminal underworld

AI_Prompt_Template: City name + landmark + terrain type + population density

Combat_Scale: Amount and type of property damage
AI_Prompt_Template: Damage scale + affected structures + estimated costs
Media_Source: an estimated $2.3 million in damaged buildings

AI_Prompt_Template: Casualty numbers + evacuation numbers + medical treatment
Combat length + decisive moments + turning points
Media_Source: brutal 15-minute battle that seemed like hours

Combat_Scale: Key moment that decided combat outcome

Narrative_Style: What happened immediately after combat ended

Narrative_Style: Standard news article with headline and byline
